sub_title: Impact Investing | Project Management | (Francophone) Africa | Water & Maritime | Renewable Energy | Agri-food | Health | Infrastructure | Polyglot
summary:
My international background, the many years spent abroad and the five languages (French, Spanish, Italian, English & Dutch) I speak fluently in addition to conversational Portuguese allow me to adapt easily to new environments. I am an impact driven relationships and partnerships builder who thrives in dynamic and multicultural companies and organizations. I feel passionate about social entrepreneurship, sports and sustainable initiatives. My commercial instinct, enthusiasm and communication skills allow me to bring people together and create win-win situations for all stakeholders. I’m result oriented and love getting things done. Diplomacy, flexibility and perseverance are key words that describe me best.  

- Solid program and project management experience in complex environments 
- Accustomed to managing multi-million-dollar budgets
- Managed and lead projects throughout the complete project life cycle including internal project controls
- Procurement experience on both sides 

Extensive work experience (15 years) in emerging markets mainly across Africa and Latin America.

[{'company': {'id': 25959742, 'name': 'Invest International', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFSxczVT-qFvQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1648113944739?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=CpJxmgXmEAyNpiFmqvtpdZe4mIq64iVldEDRfa814J4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/invest-international/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Invest International', 'description': 'At Invest International we build the sustainable markets of tomorrow by making the more complex investments in innovative solutions financeable. To achieve the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (SDG’s) public and private interests coincide. That’s why our operations support governments and companies. We offer them case specific financing arrangements as well as project development capacity. 
We bring the international financing of high-risk, innovative solutions to the next level. Our hybrid business model enables us to support governments and companies by providing capital as well as project development capacity. We help to make the more difficult investments in innovative solutions financeable, be it in export finance, project finance, and financing the sustainability of global value chains. Yet, in everything we do we live ‘impact first’. We see financial returns only as a necessity to make our operations sustainable.

I am responsible for the assessment of project proposals and the development, financing and management of projects under the Public Programs of Invest International. 

In my job as country lead for Senegal, Morocco and Guinea Conakry I assess project applications and comprehensive proposals submitted by the applicants, oversee the proper implementation of projects, monitor and guide procurement processes of large infrastructure projects, and maintain intensive contacts with government agencies in the countries concerned, embassies, relevant International financial institutions and donors, as well as companies, consultants, contractors, knowledge institutes and/or NGOs that carry out or contribute to the projects.
Besides these 3 countries I also work on projects in Bolivia and the D.R. Congo.', 'title': 'Investment & Project Manager Public Infrastructure Programs (Francophone) Africa', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 797496, 'name': 'IDA Foundation', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQH7Q68foGJ-bA/company-logo_400_400/0/1648458908363?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=xcQ_-1WH8o3RnRsKKXX5mOleWsJgP47kdx0TkXnup1c', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/idafoundation/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'IDA Foundation', 'description': "IDA Foundation is an independent social enterprise providing medicine and medical goods to healthcare organisations worldwide, at the best price possible. 

Turnover responsibility of US$15 million p/year
Responsible for sales, procurement & business development in French & Portuguese speaking Africa, Lesotho, Swaziland, Equatorial-Guinea, Sierra Leone, Liberia, Myanmar, Bhutan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Papua New Guinea, Timor-Leste, the Philippines, Vanuatu & Pacific Islands, Guyana, Surinam, Bolivia & Peru.  

Managed a distributor and agent network of 35. Management of 5 FTE. 

Developed and implemented exclusive partnerships with Pfizer and Ferring pharmaceuticals. 

We recognize that in today's world, essential medicines remain out of reach for too many people. IDA bridges those gaps so that healthcare providers have access to quality products at a fair price. We distribute over 3000 different health products to customers, distributors and partners in over 130 countries. WakaWaka believes in Safe, Sustainable Solar for All. 

As part of their mission, to increase access to sustainable energy worldwide, WakaWaka promises that for every product sold, they help a person living off the grid to get access to sustainable light & energy.

WakaWaka develops and sells highly efficient, iconic solar powered energy products in over 40 countries across all continents.

• Responsible for €2 million + turnover', 'title': 'Global Distribution Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3055106, 'name': 'ENGIE Energy Access', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQEPBIDZwQ5TIw/company-logo_400_400/0/1692264763452?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=vovds46_BZiH5UVSkOQi9xx6eI2VET8JCY6SO3yNa8c', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/engieenergyaccess/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Kampala, Uganda', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'ENGIE Energy Access (Africa)', 'description': 'Fenix’s mission is to improve the quality of life of its customers through inclusive energy and financial services.
